abstract: Guatemalan court rules former dictator Gen Efrain Rios Montt must face new trial regarding genocide allegations of Maya Ixil Indians but because of his dementia it will be closed.
lead_paragraph: Gen. Efraín Ríos Montt, who came to power in a 1982 coup, is accused of leading the persecution of the Maya Ixil Indians.

headline.main: Genocide Retrial Is Set for Guatemalan Former Dictator
headline.print_headline: Former Dictator Faces Genocide Retrial in Guatemala

snippet: Gen. Efraín Ríos Montt, who came to power in a 1982 coup, is accused of leading the persecution of the Maya Ixil Indians.
